title: help me "reconnect"
body: just got done winning a game and instead bringing me to the stats, it put me continuously in a reconnect window.  i closed everything down but each time i log in it still tries to reconnect me to my dead game

replies.body: We've been having some issues with ghost games over the past 2 days, but luckily this kind of issue will clear itself up after the game is able to properly report that the match ended. Have you been able to get back in a game yet?
